actions.name: AcceptDirectConnectGatewayAssociationProposal
actions.description: Grants permission to accept a proposal request to attach a virtual private gateway to a Direct Connect gateway

actions.name: AllocateConnectionOnInterconnect
actions.description: Grants permission to create a hosted connection on an interconnect

actions.name: AllocateHostedConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new hosted connection between a AWS Direct Connect partner's network and a specific AWS Direct Connect location

actions.name: AllocatePrivateVirtualInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to provision a private virtual interface to be owned by a different customer

actions.name: AllocatePublicVirtualInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to provision a public virtual interface to be owned by a different customer

actions.name: AllocateTransitVirtualInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to provision a transit virtual interface to be owned by a different customer

actions.name: AssociateConnectionWithLag
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a connection with a LAG

actions.name: AssociateHostedConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a hosted connection and its virtual interfaces with a link aggregation group (LAG) or interconnect

actions.name: AssociateMacSecKey
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a MAC Security (MACsec) Connection Key Name (CKN)/ Connectivity Association Key (CAK) pair with an AWS Direct Connect dedicated connection

actions.name: AssociateVirtualInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a virtual interface with a specified link aggregation group (LAG) or connection

actions.name: ConfirmConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to confirm the creation of a hosted connection on an interconnect

actions.name: ConfirmCustomerAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to confirm the the terms of agreement when creating the connection or link aggregation group (LAG)

actions.name: ConfirmPrivateVirtualInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to accept ownership of a private virtual interface created by another customer

actions.name: ConfirmPublicVirtualInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to accept ownership of a public virtual interface created by another customer

actions.name: ConfirmTransitVirtualInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to accept ownership of a transit virtual interface created by another customer

actions.name: CreateBGPPeer
actions.description: Grants permission to create a BGP peer on the specified virtual interface

actions.name: CreateConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new connection between the customer network and a specific AWS Direct Connect location

actions.name: CreateDirectConnectGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Direct Connect gateway, which is an intermediate object that enables you to connect a set of virtual interfaces and virtual private gateways

actions.name: CreateDirectConnectGatewayAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to create an association between a Direct Connect gateway and a virtual private gateway

actions.name: CreateDirectConnectGatewayAssociationProposal
actions.description: Grants permission to create a proposal to associate the specified virtual private gateway with the specified Direct Connect gateway

actions.name: CreateInterconnect
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new interconnect between a AWS Direct Connect partner's network and a specific AWS Direct Connect location

actions.name: CreateLag
actions.description: Grants permission to create a link aggregation group (LAG) with the specified number of bundled physical connections between the customer network and a specific AWS Direct Connect location

actions.name: CreatePrivateVirtualInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new private virtual interface

actions.name: CreatePublicVirtualInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new public virtual interface

actions.name: CreateTransitVirtualInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new transit virtual interface

actions.name: DeleteBGPPeer
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified BGP peer on the specified virtual interface with the specified customer address and ASN

actions.name: DeleteConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the connection

actions.name: DeleteDirectConnectGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified Direct Connect gateway

actions.name: DeleteDirectConnectGatewayAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the association between the specified Direct Connect gateway and virtual private gateway

actions.name: DeleteDirectConnectGatewayAssociationProposal
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the association proposal request between the specified Direct Connect gateway and virtual private gateway

actions.name: DeleteInterconnect
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified interconnect

actions.name: DeleteLag
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified link aggregation group (LAG)

actions.name: DeleteVirtualInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a virtual interface

actions.name: DescribeConnectionLoa
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the LOA-CFA for a Connection

actions.name: DescribeConnections
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all connections in this region

actions.name: DescribeConnectionsOnInterconnect
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a list of connections that have been provisioned on the given interconnect

actions.name: DescribeCustomerMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to view a list of customer agreements, along with their signed status and whether the customer is an NNIPartner, NNIPartnerV2, or a nonPartner

actions.name: DescribeDirectConnectGatewayAssociationProposals
actions.description: Grants permission to describe one or more association proposals for connection between a virtual private gateway and a Direct Connect gateway

actions.name: DescribeDirectConnectGatewayAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the associations between your Direct Connect gateways and virtual private gateways

actions.name: DescribeDirectConnectGatewayAttachments
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the attachments between your Direct Connect gateways and virtual interfaces

actions.name: DescribeDirectConnectGateways
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all your Direct Connect gateways or only the specified Direct Connect gateway

actions.name: DescribeHostedConnections
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the hosted connections that have been provisioned on the specified interconnect or link aggregation group (LAG)

actions.name: DescribeInterconnectLoa
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the LOA-CFA for an Interconnect

actions.name: DescribeInterconnects
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a list of interconnects owned by the AWS account

actions.name: DescribeLags
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all your link aggregation groups (LAG) or the specified LAG

actions.name: DescribeLoa
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the LOA-CFA for a connection, interconnect, or link aggregation group (LAG)

actions.name: DescribeLocations
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the list of AWS Direct Connect locations in the current AWS region

actions.name: DescribeRouterConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to describe Details about the router for a virtual interface

actions.name: DescribeTags
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the tags associated with the specified AWS Direct Connect resources

actions.name: DescribeVirtualGateways
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a list of virtual private gateways owned by the AWS account

actions.name: DescribeVirtualInterfaces
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all virtual interfaces for an AWS account

actions.name: DisassociateConnectionFromLag
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a connection from a link aggregation group (LAG)

actions.name: DisassociateMacSecKey
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the association between a MAC Security (MACsec) security key and an AWS Direct Connect dedicated connection

actions.name: ListVirtualInterfaceTestHistory
actions.description: Grants permission to list the virtual interface failover test history

actions.name: StartBgpFailoverTest
actions.description: Grants permission to start the virtual interface failover test that verifies your configuration meets your resiliency requirements by placing the BGP peering session in the DOWN state. You can then send traffic to verify that there are no outages

actions.name: StopBgpFailoverTest
actions.description: Grants permission to stop the virtual interface failover test

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add the specified tags to the specified AWS Direct Connect resource. Each resource can have a maximum of 50 tags

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from the specified AWS Direct Connect resource

actions.name: UpdateConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to update the AWS Direct Connect dedicated connection configuration. You can update the following parameters for a connection: The connection name or The connection's MAC Security (MACsec) encryption mode

actions.name: UpdateDirectConnectGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to update the name of a Direct Connect gateway

actions.name: UpdateDirectConnectGatewayAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to update the specified attributes of the Direct Connect gateway association

actions.name: UpdateLag
actions.description: Grants permission to update the attributes of the specified link aggregation group (LAG)

actions.name: UpdateVirtualInterfaceAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to update the specified attributes of the specified virtual private interface
